response.original_title: Billy Collins: On the Road with the Poet Laureate
response.overview: Billy Collins is perhaps the first American poet since Robert Frost to enjoy both critical and popular acclaim. This documentary follows him from poetry readings and college classrooms to his home, office, and even into his car. Collins manages to remain amazingly witty, gracious, and open in discussing his life, his work, and the nature of poetry itself.
response.title: Billy Collins: On the Road with the Poet Laureate
